bill.summary:
Crossroads of the American Revolution National Heritage Area Act of 2021
This bill extends the authority of the Department of the Interior to provide assistance for the Crossroads of the American Revolution National Heritage Area in New Jersey until September 30, 2036.
The bill removes the limitation on the total amount that may be appropriated for the heritage area.
